text.section: If a court of another state in which a guardianship or protective proceeding is pending requests assistance of the kind provided in subsection (1) of this section, a court of this state has jurisdiction for the limited purpose of granting the request or making reasonable efforts to comply with the request.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 5, effective June 8, 2011.
